section.p:
Update brings changes from the repository into your working copy.
It brings your working copy up-to-date with the HEAD (latest) revision from the repository.
How to update a working copy:
1.Open the solution/project you want to work with.
2.Select and right click on a item you want to update. By selecting a solution/project, update will be done recursively on all files under the item.
3.Select 'Update' from the items menu.
Ankhs output window will show all the files that has been updated.
